(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NN inspiration)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB visit)
            (NP (DT a) (NN soy) (NN sauce) (NN factory))
            (ADVP (RB first))))))
    (VP (VBD came)
      (ADVP (RB about))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (VP (VBG watching)
              (NP (DT the) (JJ Korean) (NN drama))))))
      (, ,))))


det(inspiration-2, The-1)
nsubj(came-10, inspiration-2)
aux(visit-4, to-3)
infmod(inspiration-2, visit-4)
det(factory-8, a-5)
nn(factory-8, soy-6)
nn(factory-8, sauce-7)
dobj(visit-4, factory-8)
advmod(visit-4, first-9)
root(ROOT-0, came-10)
advmod(came-10, about-11)
advmod(watching-15, when-12)
nsubj(watching-15, I-13)
aux(watching-15, was-14)
advcl(came-10, watching-15)
det(drama-18, the-16)
amod(drama-18, Korean-17)
dobj(watching-15, drama-18)

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (EX There))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (NP
        (NP (CD one) (JJ particular) (NN scene))
        (SBAR
          (WHADVP (WRB where))
          (S
            (NP (NNP Sung) (NNP Chan))
            (VP (VBD visited)
              (NP
                (NP (DT a) (NNP Soya) (NNP Sauce) (NN factory))
                (SBAR
                  (WHADVP (WRB where))
                  (S
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNS rows))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP (NNP Soy) (NNP Sauce))))

                      (SBAR
                        (WHADVP (WRB where))
                        (S
                          (VP
                            (ADVP (RB silently))
                            (VBG fermenting)
                            (ADVP (RB away))
                            (PP (IN in)
                              (NP (DT the) (NN field)))))))))))))))
    (. .)))

              (NP (PRP we))

nsubj(is-2, reason-4)
neg(get-7, not-5)
aux(get-7, to-6)
xcomp(is-2, get-7)
dobj(get-7, hold-8)
prep(hold-8, of-9)
det(Sauce-12, this-10)
nn(Sauce-12, Soy-11)
pobj(of-9, Sauce-12)
aux(see-14, to-13)
xcomp(get-7, see-14)

advcl(see-14, makes-17)

dobj(makes-17, difference-19)
prep(makes-17, to-20)
poss(dishes-22, your-21)
pobj(to-20, dishes-22)


(ROOT
  (SBAR (IN If)
    (S
      (NP (PRP you))
      (VP (VBP do) (RB n't))
      (, ,))))


mark(do-3, If-1)
nsubj(do-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, do-3)
neg(do-3, n't-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (ADVP (RB still))
    (VP (VBP make)
      (NP
        (NP (DT an) (JJ excellent) (NN gift))
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP (NNS friends)
            (CC or)
            (NNS relatives)))
        (SBAR
          (WHNP (WP who))
          (S
            (VP (VB cook))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(make-3, they-1)
advmod(make-3, still-2)
root(ROOT-0, make-3)

amod(gift-6, excellent-5)
dobj(make-3, gift-6)
prep(gift-6, for-7)
pobj(for-7, friends-8)
cc(friends-8, or-9)
conj(friends-8, relatives-10)
nsubj(cook-12, who-11)
rcmod(gift-6, cook-12)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN For)
      (NP
        (NP (PRP me))
        (ADVP (RB personally))))
    (, ,)))

pobj(For-1, me-2)
advmod(me-2, personally-3)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT this))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADVP (RB probably))
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN discovery))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBP have)
              (VP (VBN made)
                (ADVP (RB so) (RB far))
                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP
                    (NP (PRP$ my) (CD five) (NNS years))
                    (PP (IN of)
                      (NP (NN blogging)))))))))))
    (. !)))

prep(made-9, in-12)
poss(years-15, my-13)
num(years-15, five-14)
pobj(in-12, years-15)
prep(years-15, of-16)
pobj(of-16, blogging-17)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VBG Kwong)
      (S
        (NP (NNP Woh) (NNP Hing))
        (NP
          (NP (CD 5) (NNP Defu) (NNP Lane) (CD 9) (NNP Singapore) (CD 539247) (NNP Open) (NNS 9am))
          (PP (TO to)
            (NP (JJ 5pm) (JJ daily) (NNP Saturdays) (NNS 9am)))))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (JJ 3pm) (NNP Closed)))
      (PP (IN on)
        (NP (NNP Sundays) (CD 62889497)))
      (S
        (VP (VBG www.kwh.com.sg)
          (NP (VB Note)))))
    (: :)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (VBG Kwong) (NNP Woh) (VBG Hing) (NNS products))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADVP (RB only))
      (ADJP
        (ADJP (JJ available) (JJ direct))
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP (PRP$ their) (NN factory)))))
    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNPS Sauces))
    (VP (MD will)
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (JJ available)
          (PP (IN during)
            (NP
              (NP (PRP$ their) (NN roadshow))
              (PP (IN on)
                (NP (CD 30)))
              (NP (NNP June)))))
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP
            (NP (CD 10) (NNP Jul) (CD 2011))
            (PP (IN at)
              (NP (NNP Takashimaya) (NNP Square) (NNP B2) (NNP View) (NNP Larger) (NNP Map)))))))))


det(Sauces-2, The-1)
nsubj(available-5, Sauces-2)
aux(available-5, will-3)
cop(available-5, be-4)
root(ROOT-0, available-5)
prep(available-5, during-6)
poss(roadshow-8, their-7)
pobj(during-6, roadshow-8)
prep(roadshow-8, on-9)
pobj(on-9, 30-10)
dep(roadshow-8, June-11)
prep(available-5, to-12)
num(Jul-14, 10-13)
pobj(to-12, Jul-14)
num(Jul-14, 2011-15)
prep(Jul-14, at-16)

nn(Map-22, Square-18)

nn(Map-22, View-20)
nn(Map-22, Larger-21)
